Anyone who is already working on something for this mod will not have any other task assigned to them until they are finished with what they are currently working on.

For anyone else who has certain wishes for this mod, send Augustus a PM and he'll add it to the to-do-list in the spread sheet.

Side note; Lets try to keep our posts on this thread related to this mod, and not to homework or other random nonsense
